Name: Disasters at Sea
Title: Shipwrecked In Alaska
Desc: Deadly flooding sinks the Alaska Ranger, forcing the crew to abandon ship in frigid waters.
LongDescription: Deadly flooding sinks the Alaska Ranger in March 2008, forcing the crew to abandon ship into the frigid waters off the coast of Alaska; their retrieval marks the largest cold water rescue in the history of the U.S. Coast Guard.
